TopicTitle: Is anyone else able to launch a space plane?

Articles.Content: A few of my designs worked and could go into space and across the ocean, but now all they do is drag across the tarmac and crash into the ocean, is this a bug or is it just my designs

The attitude of the wings has been modified: for example the Delta wing makes the craft pitch up a bit.

I suggest that you build simple crafts (not necessarely spaceplanes, planes are good too) to test the part\'s new functionality.
